title: Provide density options for links in model editor

content.raw:
Feedback:

"..the default weight as a 1kg block that is 1m x 1m.  That is really a very low density, compared to metal or something like that.  It’s something even less than Styrofoam.  So when it gets scaled down, it’s like adding a Styrofoam peanut, which has no real effect. "

Some densities to consider:

- Steel: 7800 kg/m^3

- Aluminum: 2700 kg/m^3

- ABS (plastic): 1050 kg/m^3

- Water: 1000 kg/m^3

- Styrofoam: 40 kg/m^3
content.html:
Feedback:

"..the default weight as a 1kg block that is 1m x 1m. That is really a very low density, compared to metal or something like that. It’s something even less than Styrofoam. So when it gets scaled down, it’s like adding a Styrofoam peanut, which has no real effect. "

Some densities to consider:

  • Steel: 7800 kg/m^3

  • Aluminum: 2700 kg/m^3

  • ABS (plastic): 1050 kg/m^3

  • Water: 1000 kg/m^3

  • Styrofoam: 40 kg/m^3
